instruction:
Guild Wars 2 WvW counter-picker.

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 9 Firebrand + 9 Scourge + 5 Scrapper + 3 Vindicator + 2 Holosmith + 2 Dragonhunter + 2 Druid + 2 Specter + 2 Catalyst + 2 Daredevil + 2 Soulbeast + 2 Weaver + Harbinger + Spellbreaker

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Holosmith: dps, burst, roam (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Harbinger: condi, dps, elixir (weak to: burst, boon strip)
- Vindicator: dps, burst, leap (weak to: boon strip, CC)
- Scourge: condi, corrupt, barrier (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Specter: support, barrier, stealth (weak to: boon strip, reveals)
- Spellbreaker: frontline, strip, cc (weak to: condi pressure, kiting)
- Catalyst: dps, combo, burst (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Daredevil: roam, mobility, burst (weak to: AoE, reveals)
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)
- Weaver: dps, condi, pressure (weak to: burst, CC)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 3x Spellbreaker, 3x Willbender, 3x Scourge, 2x Reaper, 2x Harbinger
FOCUS: Druid > Scrapper > Firebrand
TACTIQUE: Strip stability with Spellbreaker bubble before CC push

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: GUILD RAID (10-25 players)
Enemy composition: 2 Dragonhunter + 2 Druid + Chronomancer + Soulbeast + Scrapper + Reaper + Firebrand

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Chronomancer: support, boon, portal (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 1x Scrapper, 1x Firebrand, 1x Deadeye, 1x Willbender
FOCUS: Scrapper > Druid > Firebrand
TACTIQUE: Focus healers first to reduce sustain

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 8 Scrapper + 7 Spellbreaker + 7 Soulbeast + 5 Untamed + 4 Specter + 4 Firebrand + 4 Daredevil + 3 Scourge + 3 Reaper + 3 Tempest + 2 Renegade + 2 Weaver + 2 Virtuoso + Holosmith + Berserker + Harbinger + Deadeye + Herald + Mirage

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Spellbreaker: frontline, strip, cc (weak to: condi pressure, kiting)
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)
- Holosmith: dps, burst, roam (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Specter: support, barrier, stealth (weak to: boon strip, reveals)
- Untamed: dps, cc, pet (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Renegade: support, alacrity, backline (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Berserker: dps, burst, frontline (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Scourge: condi, corrupt, barrier (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Harbinger: condi, dps, elixir (weak to: burst, boon strip)
- Tempest: support, aura, heal (weak to: burst, interrupts)
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Deadeye: sniper, burst, backline (weak to: mobility, stealth reveal)
- Weaver: dps, condi, pressure (weak to: burst, CC)
- Herald: frontline, boon, facetank (weak to: boon strip, condi pressure)
- Daredevil: roam, mobility, burst (weak to: AoE, reveals)
- Mirage: condi, dps, roam (weak to: cleave, reveals)
- Virtuoso: dps, burst, backline (weak to: gap closers, pressure)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 3x Spellbreaker, 3x Scrapper, 3x Firebrand, 3x Reaper, 3x Harbinger
FOCUS: Scrapper > Tempest > Firebrand
TACTIQUE: Strip stability with Spellbreaker bubble before CC push

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: Firebrand + Spellbreaker + Druid

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Spellbreaker: frontline, strip, cc (weak to: condi pressure, kiting)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 1x Spellbreaker, 1x Scourge, 1x Deadeye, 1x Willbender
FOCUS: Druid > Firebrand > Spellbreaker
TACTIQUE: Focus healers first to reduce sustain

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 3 Scrapper + 3 Firebrand + 3 Soulbeast + 2 Vindicator + 2 Dragonhunter + 2 Deadeye + Mirage + Mechanist + Catalyst + Reaper + Renegade + Druid + Untamed + Daredevil + Tempest + Virtuoso

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Mirage: condi, dps, roam (weak to: cleave, reveals)
- Vindicator: dps, burst, leap (weak to: boon strip, CC)
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)
- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)
- Deadeye: sniper, burst, backline (weak to: mobility, stealth reveal)
- Mechanist: support, alacrity, heal (weak to: burst, mech focus)
- Catalyst: dps, combo, burst (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Renegade: support, alacrity, backline (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Untamed: dps, cc, pet (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Daredevil: roam, mobility, burst (weak to: AoE, reveals)
- Tempest: support, aura, heal (weak to: burst, interrupts)
- Virtuoso: dps, burst, backline (weak to: gap closers, pressure)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 2x Spellbreaker, 2x Scrapper, 2x Firebrand, 1x Reaper, 1x Harbinger
FOCUS: Scrapper > Druid > Tempest
TACTIQUE: Focus boon strip on Firebrands first

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 2 Firebrand + 2 Druid + Reaper + Dragonhunter + Tempest + Spellbreaker + Vindicator + Renegade

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)
- Tempest: support, aura, heal (weak to: burst, interrupts)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Spellbreaker: frontline, strip, cc (weak to: condi pressure, kiting)
- Vindicator: dps, burst, leap (weak to: boon strip, CC)
- Renegade: support, alacrity, backline (weak to: burst, focus fire)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 1x Spellbreaker, 1x Deadeye, 1x Scourge, 1x Willbender, 1x Scrapper
FOCUS: Tempest > Druid > Firebrand
TACTIQUE: Focus healers first to reduce sustain

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: GUILD RAID (10-25 players)
Enemy composition: 2 Reaper + Druid + Dragonhunter + Untamed

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Untamed: dps, cc, pet (weak to: condi, kiting)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 1x Scrapper, 1x Firebrand, 1x Deadeye, 1x Willbender
FOCUS: Druid > Reaper > Dragonhunter
TACTIQUE: Interrupt key heal skills

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 6 Scrapper + 5 Reaper + 4 Firebrand + Druid + Mirage + Scourge + Chronomancer + Soulbeast + Herald + Daredevil + Harbinger + Berserker

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Mirage: condi, dps, roam (weak to: cleave, reveals)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Scourge: condi, corrupt, barrier (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Chronomancer: support, boon, portal (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)
- Herald: frontline, boon, facetank (weak to: boon strip, condi pressure)
- Daredevil: roam, mobility, burst (weak to: AoE, reveals)
- Harbinger: condi, dps, elixir (weak to: burst, boon strip)
- Berserker: dps, burst, frontline (weak to: condi, kiting)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 3x Scrapper, 3x Firebrand, 3x Spellbreaker, 3x Reaper, 3x Harbinger
FOCUS: Druid > Scrapper > Firebrand
TACTIQUE: Split supports from DPS with positioning

FOCUS: Chronomancer > Virtuoso > Harbinger
TACTIQUE: Save defensive cooldowns for burst windows

- Renegade: support, alacrity, backline (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Spellbreaker: frontline, strip, cc (weak to: condi pressure, kiting)

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 3 Soulbeast + 2 Tempest + 2 Daredevil + 2 Mechanist + 2 Berserker + 2 Willbender + 2 Scourge + Spellbreaker + Untamed + Scrapper + Firebrand + Druid + Reaper + Catalyst + Virtuoso

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Tempest: support, aura, heal (weak to: burst, interrupts)
- Daredevil: roam, mobility, burst (weak to: AoE, reveals)
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)
- Mechanist: support, alacrity, heal (weak to: burst, mech focus)
- Berserker: dps, burst, frontline (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Willbender: roam, dps, mobility (weak to: CC, condi pressure)
- Spellbreaker: frontline, strip, cc (weak to: condi pressure, kiting)
- Untamed: dps, cc, pet (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Scourge: condi, corrupt, barrier (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Catalyst: dps, combo, burst (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Virtuoso: dps, burst, backline (weak to: gap closers, pressure)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 2x Spellbreaker, 2x Scrapper, 2x Firebrand, 2x Willbender, 1x Deadeye
FOCUS: Tempest > Scrapper > Druid
TACTIQUE: Strip stability with Spellbreaker bubble before CC push

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 2 Scourge + 2 Reaper + Firebrand + Holosmith + Scrapper + Herald + Renegade + Untamed + Dragonhunter

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Scourge: condi, corrupt, barrier (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Holosmith: dps, burst, roam (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Herald: frontline, boon, facetank (weak to: boon strip, condi pressure)
- Renegade: support, alacrity, backline (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Untamed: dps, cc, pet (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 2x Spellbreaker, 1x Willbender, 1x Scourge, 1x Scrapper, 1x Firebrand
FOCUS: Scrapper > Firebrand > Herald
TACTIQUE: Stack cleanses and resistance before engaging

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 6 Firebrand + 5 Scrapper + 5 Reaper + 5 Scourge + 4 Soulbeast + 4 Tempest + 3 Catalyst + 3 Harbinger + 2 Spellbreaker + 2 Chronomancer + 2 Renegade + 2 Virtuoso + Dragonhunter + Druid + Vindicator + Untamed + Daredevil + Weaver

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)
- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Scourge: condi, corrupt, barrier (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Spellbreaker: frontline, strip, cc (weak to: condi pressure, kiting)
- Catalyst: dps, combo, burst (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Chronomancer: support, boon, portal (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Tempest: support, aura, heal (weak to: burst, interrupts)
- Harbinger: condi, dps, elixir (weak to: burst, boon strip)
- Renegade: support, alacrity, backline (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Virtuoso: dps, burst, backline (weak to: gap closers, pressure)
- Vindicator: dps, burst, leap (weak to: boon strip, CC)
- Untamed: dps, cc, pet (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Daredevil: roam, mobility, burst (weak to: AoE, reveals)
- Weaver: dps, condi, pressure (weak to: burst, CC)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 3x Spellbreaker, 3x Scrapper, 3x Firebrand, 3x Willbender, 3x Scourge
FOCUS: Scrapper > Druid > Tempest
TACTIQUE: Avoid clumping to reduce shade pressure

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 8 Scrapper + 6 Tempest + 3 Reaper + 2 Berserker + 2 Scourge + 2 Spellbreaker + 2 Daredevil + 2 Chronomancer + 2 Firebrand + 2 Virtuoso + 2 Specter + Untamed + Mechanist + Vindicator + Weaver + Renegade + Druid + Soulbeast + Herald

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Berserker: dps, burst, frontline (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Scourge: condi, corrupt, barrier (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Tempest: support, aura, heal (weak to: burst, interrupts)
- Untamed: dps, cc, pet (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Spellbreaker: frontline, strip, cc (weak to: condi pressure, kiting)
- Mechanist: support, alacrity, heal (weak to: burst, mech focus)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Daredevil: roam, mobility, burst (weak to: AoE, reveals)
- Chronomancer: support, boon, portal (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Vindicator: dps, burst, leap (weak to: boon strip, CC)
- Virtuoso: dps, burst, backline (weak to: gap closers, pressure)
- Weaver: dps, condi, pressure (weak to: burst, CC)
- Specter: support, barrier, stealth (weak to: boon strip, reveals)
- Renegade: support, alacrity, backline (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)
- Herald: frontline, boon, facetank (weak to: boon strip, condi pressure)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 3x Spellbreaker, 3x Deadeye, 3x Reaper, 3x Harbinger, 2x Willbender
FOCUS: Tempest > Scrapper > Druid
TACTIQUE: Stack cleanses and resistance before engaging

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 2 Firebrand + 2 Harbinger + 2 Weaver + 2 Dragonhunter + Virtuoso + Chronomancer + Scrapper + Reaper + Druid + Scourge + Soulbeast

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Virtuoso: dps, burst, backline (weak to: gap closers, pressure)
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Chronomancer: support, boon, portal (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Harbinger: condi, dps, elixir (weak to: burst, boon strip)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Weaver: dps, condi, pressure (weak to: burst, CC)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)
- Scourge: condi, corrupt, barrier (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 2x Spellbreaker, 1x Willbender, 1x Deadeye, 1x Scourge, 1x Scrapper
FOCUS: Scrapper > Druid > Firebrand
TACTIQUE: Save defensive cooldowns for burst windows

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 7 Reaper + 4 Soulbeast + 4 Tempest + 3 Harbinger + 3 Catalyst + 2 Firebrand + 2 Willbender + 2 Holosmith + 2 Mirage + 2 Druid + Daredevil + Deadeye + Herald

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Harbinger: condi, dps, elixir (weak to: burst, boon strip)
- Daredevil: roam, mobility, burst (weak to: AoE, reveals)
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)
- Tempest: support, aura, heal (weak to: burst, interrupts)
- Willbender: roam, dps, mobility (weak to: CC, condi pressure)
- Catalyst: dps, combo, burst (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Holosmith: dps, burst, roam (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Deadeye: sniper, burst, backline (weak to: mobility, stealth reveal)
- Mirage: condi, dps, roam (weak to: cleave, reveals)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Herald: frontline, boon, facetank (weak to: boon strip, condi pressure)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 3x Scrapper, 3x Firebrand, 3x Spellbreaker, 3x Deadeye, 1x Scourge
FOCUS: Tempest > Druid > Firebrand
TACTIQUE: Burst down Scourges before they stack conditions

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 6 Druid + 4 Scourge + 3 Soulbeast + 3 Spellbreaker + 3 Catalyst + 2 Herald + 2 Specter + 2 Tempest + 2 Berserker + 2 Reaper + Firebrand + Untamed + Daredevil + Renegade + Harbinger + Vindicator + Dragonhunter + Mirage + Scrapper + Virtuoso

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)
- Firebrand: support, heal, stability (weak to: boon strip, boon corrupt)
- Herald: frontline, boon, facetank (weak to: boon strip, condi pressure)
- Untamed: dps, cc, pet (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Scourge: condi, corrupt, barrier (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Daredevil: roam, mobility, burst (weak to: AoE, reveals)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Renegade: support, alacrity, backline (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Specter: support, barrier, stealth (weak to: boon strip, reveals)
- Spellbreaker: frontline, strip, cc (weak to: condi pressure, kiting)
- Catalyst: dps, combo, burst (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Tempest: support, aura, heal (weak to: burst, interrupts)
- Harbinger: condi, dps, elixir (weak to: burst, boon strip)
- Vindicator: dps, burst, leap (weak to: boon strip, CC)
- Berserker: dps, burst, frontline (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)
- Mirage: condi, dps, roam (weak to: cleave, reveals)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Virtuoso: dps, burst, backline (weak to: gap closers, pressure)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 3x Willbender, 3x Spellbreaker, 3x Deadeye, 2x Scrapper, 2x Firebrand
FOCUS: Druid > Tempest > Scrapper
TACTIQUE: Focus burst specs before they can reset

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: ZERG (25+ players)
Enemy composition: 5 Spellbreaker + 5 Druid + 4 Reaper + 3 Catalyst + 3 Specter + 3 Scourge + 2 Dragonhunter + 2 Tempest + 2 Harbinger + 2 Untamed + 2 Scrapper + Virtuoso + Holosmith + Herald + Vindicator + Chronomancer

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Catalyst: dps, combo, burst (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)
- Specter: support, barrier, stealth (weak to: boon strip, reveals)
- Tempest: support, aura, heal (weak to: burst, interrupts)
- Virtuoso: dps, burst, backline (weak to: gap closers, pressure)
- Holosmith: dps, burst, roam (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Harbinger: condi, dps, elixir (weak to: burst, boon strip)
- Herald: frontline, boon, facetank (weak to: boon strip, condi pressure)
- Vindicator: dps, burst, leap (weak to: boon strip, CC)
- Scourge: condi, corrupt, barrier (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Untamed: dps, cc, pet (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Spellbreaker: frontline, strip, cc (weak to: condi pressure, kiting)
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Chronomancer: support, boon, portal (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 3x Willbender, 3x Deadeye, 3x Spellbreaker, 2x Scrapper, 2x Firebrand
FOCUS: Tempest > Druid > Scrapper
TACTIQUE: Interrupt key heal skills

VALID SPECS: Berserker, Bladesworn, Catalyst, Chronomancer, Daredevil, Deadeye, Dragonhunter, Druid, Firebrand, Harbinger, Herald, Holosmith, Mechanist, Mirage, Reaper, Renegade, Scourge, Scrapper, Soulbeast, Specter, Spellbreaker, Tempest, Untamed, Vindicator, Virtuoso, Weaver, Willbender

Mode: GUILD RAID (10-25 players)
Enemy composition: 2 Druid + Chronomancer + Dragonhunter + Specter + Virtuoso + Untamed

[ENEMY ANALYSIS]
- Druid: heal, support, spirits (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Chronomancer: support, boon, portal (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)
- Specter: support, barrier, stealth (weak to: boon strip, reveals)
- Virtuoso: dps, burst, backline (weak to: gap closers, pressure)
- Untamed: dps, cc, pet (weak to: condi, kiting)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec
FOCUS: Target1 > Target2
TACTIQUE: One tactical advice
output:
CONTER: 1x Willbender, 1x Deadeye, 1x Daredevil
FOCUS: Druid > Chronomancer > Dragonhunter
TACTIQUE: Interrupt key heal skills

- Dragonhunter: dps, traps, burst (weak to: condi, mobility)

- Weaver: dps, condi, pressure (weak to: burst, CC)
- Harbinger: condi, dps, elixir (weak to: burst, boon strip)
- Soulbeast: dps, burst, roam (weak to: CC, sustain fights)
- Catalyst: dps, combo, burst (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Reaper: dps, shroud, frontline (weak to: kiting, burst)
- Untamed: dps, cc, pet (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Scourge: condi, corrupt, barrier (weak to: burst, focus fire)
- Holosmith: dps, burst, roam (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Scrapper: support, superspeed, cleanse (weak to: boon strip, focus fire)
- Berserker: dps, burst, frontline (weak to: condi, kiting)
- Daredevil: roam, mobility, burst (weak to: AoE, reveals)

Respond EXACTLY in this format:
CONTER: Nx Spec, Nx Spec

output:
